name: Sand Shadow
description:
You have spent many years in hiding after the nuclear disaster. Your stocks are depleted, and hope is fading.
Jump behind the wheel of a rusty car that sits in your garage and go seek shelter in a nuclear desert and try to find something that will help you.

- Randomly generated desert and locations.
- The element of survival.

CONTROLS:
WASD - Movement
Space - shooting at foot levels
